channel.title: CVE Feed for SEIKO EPSON CORPORATION -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SEIKO EPSON CORPORATION -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47295|2024-10-01T14:01:18.787Z -- seiko%20epson%20corporation -- web%20config
item.description: Insecure initial password configuration issue in SEIKO EPSON Web Config allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to set an arbitrary password and operate the device with an administrative privilege. As for the details of the affected versions, see the information provided by the vendor under [References].
